name: Hero Climb
description:
Controls

------------------------------

Arrow keys -> move

X -> Jump

A-> Attack

------------------------------

You are the hero of the story but you have fallen into a pitfall trap in a dungeon that you have just ventured in. Now you must try to climb out of it as the dungeon lord tries to crush you with dungeon blocks and rain you with slimes. This may feel like a Tetris game but it is definitely not one!

Team Not Tetris:

Ng E-Tjing: Programmer

Chua Yu Jia: Designer, Artist, sound designer

Baxter Luke: Designer, Artist
